title: Banca di Roma - Wikipedia
snippet: Banca di Roma was an Italian bank based in Rome, formed in 1992 by merger of Banco di Santo Spirito and Banco di Roma. From 2008 it was a subsidiary of UniCredit under the name UniCredit Banca di Roma S.p.A.. In 2010 the subsidiary was absorbed into the bank, but retained as a registered trademark.

title: BCC Roma
snippet: Entro il 14 luglio 2026 i proprietari di edifici situati nei comuni di Arzignano, Brogliano, Cornedo Vicentino, Recoaro Terme, Trissino e Valdagno (provincia di Vicenza) e del comune di San Giovanni Ilarione (provincia di Verona), resi inagibili dagli eccezionali eventi metereologici del 17 e 18 aprile 2025, possono fare richiesta di sospensione delle rate dei mutui.

title: BANCA DI ROMA - Museo del Marchio Italiano
snippet: The current “Banca di Roma”, present in the credit and financial world since 1539, is one of the three banks of national interest and carries out its business in Italy and around the world. From the merger of the three oldest banks in the capital, “Cassa di Risparmio di Roma”, “Banco ...

title: Banco di Roma - Wikipedia
snippet: Banco di Roma was an Italian bank based in Rome, established on 9 March 1880. In the early 20th century, it was one of Italy's four dominant universal banks, together with Banca Commerciale Italiana, Credito Italiano, and Società Bancaria Italiana. It developed a significant network throughout the Eastern Mediterranean and Italian Africa.
